doc:
Dave Garroway https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dave_Garroway 0 David Cunningham Garroway (July 13, 1913 – July 21, 1982) was an American television personality. He was the founding host and anchor of NBC's Today from 1952 to 1961. His easygoing and relaxing style belied a lifelong battle with depression. Garroway has been honored for his contributions to radio and television with a star for each on the Hollywood Walk of Fame as well as the St. Louis Walk of Fame, the city where he spent part of his teenage years and early adulthood. David_Cunningham_Garroway ( July_13_,_1913 – July_21_,_1982 ) was an_American_television_personality . He was the_founding_host_and_anchor of NBC 's_Today from 1952 to 1961 . His_easygoing_and_relaxing_style belied a_lifelong_battle with depression .
